data.name: Space Rescue: Code Pink
data.detailed_description:
One spaceship. One loveable repair guy. Tons of sexy women. You know where this is going.

Space Rescue: Code Pink is a point-and-click adventure game filled with irreverent comedy and titillating sexual content!


You play as Keen; a young mechanic that just landed his first job on a 'Rescue & Relax' Ship. Keen's task is simple; make repairs wherever needed. Yet, what starts out as a series of straightforward tasks quickly devolves into a set of rather "sticky" situations!

Will Keen be able to keep a cool head as he attempts to fulfill the requests of his crewmates?


While exploring the spaceship you will be able to engage in a number of fun activities which allow you to progress the story and get closer to your crewmates!

  • COLLECT A HOARD OF ITEMS- people leave the strangest things laying around!
  • CONCOCT CREATIVE SOLUTIONS- solve the crew's problems using your wits!
  • PLAY VARIOUS MINIGAMES- diversity is the spice of life, mix things up a bit!
  • WOO THE LADIES- how could they not fall for a handsome & clever lad like you?

data.short_description: A point-and-click adventure game filled with irreverent comedy and titillating sexual content! One spaceship, one loveable repair guy, tons of sexy women- you know where this is going.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 4th Gen or similiar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a

data.legal_notice:
This game is created by Robin & various people who supported him. Robin is the owner & sole-copyright holder of Space Rescue: Code Pink.
This game is created with the Ren'py game-engine & various other 3rd part software. The game also uses fonts, music & sound from 3rd parties. Evertyhing is used with permission/ the approriate license.

content_descriptors.notes:
• This game contains explicit nudity & sex scenes.
    • All sex scenes are consensual. 
    • All characters are adults of at least 21.
   •  This content also goes with a touch of humor!
